tales.title: Surprise me!
tales.description: Let me pick a random classic story for you

tales.title: The Three Little Pigs
tales.description: Three pig brothers build houses of different materials to protect themselves from the big bad wolf

tales.title: Little Red Riding Hood
tales.description: A little girl in a red hood visits her grandmother and meets a cunning wolf

tales.title: Goldilocks and the Three Bears
tales.description: A curious girl explores a house belonging to three bears

tales.title: Cinderella
tales.description: A kind-hearted girl with a fairy godmother goes to the royal ball

tales.title: Sleeping Beauty
tales.description: A princess falls into a deep sleep and is awakened by true love's kiss

tales.title: Hansel and Gretel
tales.description: Two children find a candy house in the forest owned by a witch

tales.title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
tales.description: A beautiful princess finds refuge with seven dwarfs while hiding from her evil stepmother

tales.title: The Tortoise and the Hare
tales.description: A slow but steady tortoise races against a fast but overconfident hare

tales.title: The Ugly Duckling
tales.description: A different-looking duckling discovers he's actually a beautiful swan

tales.title: Jack and the Beanstalk
tales.description: A boy climbs a magical beanstalk and discovers a giant's castle in the clouds

tales.title: The Three Billy Goats Gruff
tales.description: Three goats want to cross a bridge guarded by a mean troll

tales.title: The Gingerbread Man
tales.description: A gingerbread cookie comes to life and runs away from everyone who wants to eat him

tales.title: The Little Mermaid
tales.description: A mermaid princess dreams of living on land and falls in love with a human prince

tales.title: Thumbelina
tales.description: A tiny girl the size of a thumb has adventures in the natural world

tales.title: The Town Mouse and the Country Mouse
tales.description: Two mice discover whether city life or country life is better

tales.title: The Lion and the Mouse
tales.description: A tiny mouse helps a mighty lion, proving that even the smallest can be the greatest help

tales.title: The Ant and the Grasshopper
tales.description: A hardworking ant prepares for winter while a grasshopper plays all summer

tales.title: Rapunzel
tales.description: A girl with long hair is trapped in a tower and saved by a brave prince

tales.title: Rumpelstiltskin
tales.description: A mysterious little man helps a miller's daughter spin straw into gold

tales.title: Beauty and the Beast
tales.description: A kind girl sees past appearances to find love with a cursed beast

tales.title: The Twelve Dancing Princesses
tales.description: Twelve sisters sneak out at night to dance in a magical kingdom

tales.title: Puss in Boots
tales.description: A clever cat helps his master win a princess and a kingdom

tales.title: The Bremen Town Musicians
tales.description: Four aging animals band together and find a new purpose in life

tales.title: The Elves and the Shoemaker
tales.description: Magical elves help a poor shoemaker by making beautiful shoes at night

tales.title: The Princess and the Pea
tales.description: A real princess is discovered by her sensitivity to a tiny pea under many mattresses

tales.title: The Fisherman and His Wife
tales.description: A magical fish grants wishes to a fisherman, but his wife wants more and more

tales.title: The Little Match Girl
tales.description: A poor girl finds warmth and hope through magical visions from her matches

tales.title: The Steadfast Tin Soldier
tales.description: A one-legged toy soldier's brave adventures and love for a paper ballerina

tales.title: The Wild Swans
tales.description: A princess works to break the spell that turned her eleven brothers into swans

tales.title: The Frog Prince
tales.description: A princess learns the value of keeping promises when she befriends a frog

tales.title: The Emperor's New Clothes
tales.description: An emperor is tricked by swindlers into believing he's wearing magnificent invisible clothes

tales.title: The Snow Queen
tales.description: A brave girl journeys to rescue her friend from the cold-hearted Snow Queen

tales.title: The Red Shoes
tales.description: A girl learns about vanity and humility through her magical dancing shoes

tales.title: The Nightingale
tales.description: An emperor learns to appreciate real beauty over artificial imitations

tales.title: The Fox and the Grapes
tales.description: A fox learns about accepting disappointment gracefully

tales.title: The Goose That Laid Golden Eggs
tales.description: A farmer learns that greed can destroy good fortune

tales.title: The Boy Who Cried Wolf
tales.description: A shepherd boy learns the consequences of lying and false alarms

tales.title: The Crow and the Pitcher
tales.description: A clever crow finds an innovative way to get water from a narrow pitcher

tales.title: The Wind and the Sun
tales.description: The wind and sun compete to see who can make a traveler remove his coat

tales.title: The Dog and His Reflection
tales.description: A greedy dog loses his bone when he tries to grab his reflection's bone too

tales.title: The Oak and the Reed
tales.description: A mighty oak learns that flexibility can be stronger than stubbornness

tales.title: The Mice in Council
tales.description: Mice learn that coming up with ideas is easier than carrying them out

tales.title: The Fox and the Stork
tales.description: A fox learns about treating others the way you want to be treated

tales.title: King Midas and the Golden Touch
tales.description: A king learns that getting everything you wish for isn't always good

tales.title: Pandora's Box
tales.description: The first woman's curiosity releases troubles into the world, but also hope

tales.title: Noah's Ark
tales.description: Noah builds a great boat to save animals from a worldwide flood

tales.title: David and Goliath
tales.description: A small shepherd boy defeats a giant warrior with faith and a sling

tales.title: Jonah and the Whale
tales.description: A man learns about obedience after being swallowed by a great fish

tales.title: Robin Hood
tales.description: A noble outlaw and his merry men help the poor in Sherwood Forest

tales.title: King Arthur and the Sword in the Stone
tales.description: A young boy proves he's destined to be king by pulling a sword from a stone

tales.title: Paul Bunyan and Babe the Blue Ox
tales.description: A giant lumberjack and his blue ox have incredible adventures across America

tales.title: John Henry
tales.description: A steel-driving man races against a machine to prove human strength and spirit

tales.title: Pecos Bill
tales.description: A cowboy raised by coyotes tames the Wild West with his amazing skills

tales.title: Johnny Appleseed
tales.description: A kind man travels across America planting apple trees for future generations

tales.title: Stone Soup
tales.description: Clever travelers teach a village about sharing by making soup from a stone

tales.title: Chicken Little
tales.description: A young chick thinks the sky is falling and causes a panic among farm animals

tales.title: The Little Engine That Could
tales.description: A small train engine succeeds where bigger engines failed through determination

tales.title: The Velveteen Rabbit
tales.description: A stuffed rabbit learns what it means to become real through a child's love

tales.title: The Giving Tree
tales.description: A tree's unconditional love for a boy throughout his entire life

tales.title: Where the Wild Things Are
tales.description: A boy's imagination takes him to a land of wild creatures

tales.title: Corduroy
tales.description: A toy bear in a department store searches for his missing button

tales.title: Goodnight Moon
tales.description: A bunny says goodnight to everything in his room before falling asleep

tales.title: The Very Hungry Caterpillar
tales.description: A caterpillar eats his way through the week and transforms into a butterfly

tales.title: The Rainbow Fish
tales.description: A beautiful fish learns the joy of sharing and making friends

tales.title: Guess How Much I Love You
tales.description: A little hare and big hare express their love for each other

tales.title: Love You Forever
tales.description: A mother's enduring love for her son throughout his life

tales.title: Chicka Chicka Boom Boom
tales.description: The letters of the alphabet climb up a coconut tree

tales.title: Brown Bear, Brown Bear, What Do You See?
tales.description: Different colored animals see other animals in a rhythmic pattern

tales.title: Caps for Sale
tales.description: A cap seller has a funny encounter with mischievous monkeys

tales.title: Mike Mulligan and His Steam Shovel
tales.description: A man and his steam shovel prove their worth in the modern world

tales.title: Make Way for Ducklings
tales.description: A family of ducks finds the perfect place to raise their babies in Boston

tales.title: Curious George
tales.description: A curious little monkey gets into all sorts of adventures

tales.title: Madeline
tales.description: A brave little girl in Paris has an adventure when she gets her appendix removed

tales.title: The Runaway Bunny
tales.description: A mother rabbit assures her little bunny of her love no matter where he goes

tales.title: The Story of Ferdinand
tales.description: A gentle bull who prefers smelling flowers to fighting in the bullring

tales.title: Little House in the Big Woods
tales.description: A pioneer family's life in the Wisconsin wilderness

tales.title: Charlotte's Web
tales.description: A spider saves a pig's life through her clever web messages

tales.title: Stuart Little
tales.description: A mouse born into a human family has big adventures in New York City

tales.title: Winnie-the-Pooh
tales.description: A boy and his stuffed bear have adventures in the Hundred Acre Wood

tales.title: The Secret Garden
tales.description: A spoiled girl discovers friendship and healing in a hidden garden

tales.title: The Wonderful Wizard of Oz
tales.description: A girl and her dog journey through a magical land to get home

tales.title: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
tales.description: A girl falls down a rabbit hole into a world of nonsense and magic

tales.title: Peter Pan
tales.description: The boy who never grows up takes children on adventures to Neverland

tales.title: The Jungle Book
tales.description: A boy raised by wolves learns the laws of the jungle

tales.title: Black Beauty
tales.description: The autobiography of a horse and his various owners

tales.title: Anne of Green Gables
tales.description: An imaginative orphan girl finds a loving home with an elderly brother and sister

tales.title: Heidi
tales.description: A girl brings joy and healing to her grandfather in the Swiss Alps

tales.title: Little Women
tales.description: Four sisters grow up during the Civil War era in New England

tales.title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
tales.description: A mischievous boy's adventures along the Mississippi River

tales.title: Treasure Island
tales.description: A boy joins pirates on a dangerous quest for buried treasure

tales.title: Swiss Family Robinson
tales.description: A family shipwrecked on an island creates a new life in the wilderness

tales.title: Robinson Crusoe
tales.description: A man survives alone on a desert island for many years

tales.title: The Wind in the Willows
tales.description: Animal friends have adventures along the riverbank

tales.title: Just So Stories
tales.description: Imaginative tales explaining how animals got their distinctive features

tales.title: Doctor Dolittle
tales.description: A doctor who can talk to animals has amazing adventures

tales.title: Mary Poppins
tales.description: A magical nanny brings wonder and order to the Banks family
